Package affichage

Class Camera

java.lang.Object
affichage.Camera
public class Camera extends Object
The Camera class represents the viewpoint and configuration of a camera. It defines the camera's position (lookFrom), the point it's looking at (lookAt), the up vector, and the field of view (fov) for rendering scenes.
